WorkItem.Description:
See this related bug:
http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/RSRP-414944

In WP7, WP7.5, WP8 and WP8.1 Silverlight projects is not supported to use the alternative name for xml namespace.
If such xml namespace is used, the app throws an exception:

```
System.Windows.Markup.XamlParseException: The type 'EventToCommand' was not found because 'http://www.galasoft.ch/mvvmlight' is an unknown namespace. [Line: 29 Position: 53]
 at System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent(Object component, Uri resourceLocator)
 at ReSharperXamlBug.MainPage.InitializeComponent()
 at ReSharperXamlBug.MainPage..ctor()
```

This problem is also discussed on MSDN forum:
http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/a4475ff6-f171-4a07-bc53-79e5b776178d/xmlnsdefinition-attribute-does-not-work-in-phone-sdk?forum=silverlightwinphone
WorkItem.Summary: Remove unsupported XmlnsDefinition from WP projects

Comments.Message:
DLLs are available here:
http://1drv.ms/1ylP1TS

Nuget will be updated ASAP.
